channel.title: beard – deadbadger.net
channel.description: in a state of advanced decomposition

item.title: They call me MISTER Beard
item.dc:creator: Dead Badger
item.description: They do, you know. “Hey, Mr Beard,” they’ll say, gaily demanding that I fetch their still-fluffy underage lungs some fags from the corner shop. “Oh go on,” they say, trapped in their dilapidated schoolyard until the scandalous hour of 3pm. “No,” I say. But today, a disturbing development. “Ha ha,” one of the lovable ruffians Continue reading →

But today, a disturbing development. “Ha ha,” one of the lovable ruffians Continue reading →
